summary:
Medusa Armor Recolour

All credits go to Modauthor ZEROFROST for his friendly permission to recolour his wonderful mod:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31229/?
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/80670476@N02/11986473196/][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2806/11986473196_f8165ff973_c.jpg[/img][/url]

ATTENTION, THIS IS ONLY A RECOLOURING OF [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3140055/?]Zerofrost[/url]Â´s MOD!

WHAT YOU SEE IS, IS WHAT YOU GET!

[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/80670476@N02/11986038594/][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3676/11986038594_919e9949c7_c.jpg[/img][/url]

INSTALLATION (README):

FIRST STEP --> Download the original Mod
Mod Name : Medusa Armor (Mod Author:[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3140055/?]Zerofrost[/url]):
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31229/?]Medusa Drakul armor by Zerofrost Satyr[/url]

SECOND STEP --> Drag and drop/ copy and paste the datafiles according to your
own taste into the folder/path below:
>> Your local direction..... -> Skyrim -> Data -> textures -> armor -> MedusaArmor <<

[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/80670476@N02/11986474056/][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5516/11986474056_16d6659706_c.jpg[/img][/url]

BIG THANKS go to Modauthor "Zerofrost" for his friendly permission to recolour his wonderful mod...
>>To my buddies "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/258673/?]Corfus[/url]" and "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6537199/?]lowol64[/url]"
for their great showcases and support<<
>>Specially to "mon ami: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4708873/?]turboscalpeur[/url]" for sharing his ideas and great locations
to make wonderful captures (Partners in CROM!)<<
And at least to all the nice folks i have met here, you were
all always very inspiring to me. THANKS, folks!

CYA,
KnErBSE733

[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/80670476@N02/11985948123/][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2882/11985948123_4ab2747cc0_c.jpg[/img][/url]
Video by sidras01 --->Thank you for the clip!<---
[youtube]JpcOtr4izTQ#t[/youtube]
